moduleMeta.name: overlandInitialInput
moduleMeta.author: longyinping11@lzb.ac.cn
moduleMeta.description: reading or generating the initial condition of the model, i.e. the initial values of the state variables, including soil moisture, depth to ground water, ground water storage, canopy interceped water, surface water storage and water in snow packs

var.name: moisturePath
var.description: the soil moisture file path, if the path is set none, the initial values will be generated by the model

var.name: dglPath
var.description: the depth to ground water file path, if the path is set none, the initial values will be generated by the model

var.name: GWstPath
var.description: the ground water storage file path, if the path is set none, the initial values will be generated by the model

var.name: CstPath
var.description: the canopy intercepted water file path, if the path is set none, the initial values will be generated by the model

var.name: snowPath
var.description: the snow pack water storage file path, if the path is set none, the initial values will be generated by the model

var.name: sstPath
var.description: the soil surface water storage file path, if the path is set none, the initial values will be generated by the model

var.name: nrows
var.description: number of rows of the 2D array that depicts the study area extent

var.name: ncols
var.description: number of colums of the 2D array that depicts the study area extent

var.name: soilDepth2D
var.description: depth of the soil profile at each grid of the study area

var.name: layerDepth3D
var.description: depth of each soil layer at each grid of the study area

var.name: acquiferDepth2D
var.description: acquifer depth at each grid of the study area

var.name: GWcs2D
var.description: groundwater storage coefficient at each grid of the study area

var.name: wsat3D
var.description: saturated soil moisture of each soil layer at each grid of the study area

var.name: wrsd3D
var.description: residual soil moisture of each soil layer at each grid of the study area

var.name: w3D
var.description: soil moisture of each soil layer at each grid of the study area

var.name: dgl2D
var.description: depth from soil surface to ground water at each grid of the study area

var.name: GWst2D
var.description: ground water storage at each grid of the study area

var.name: Cst2D
var.description: canopy intercepted water at each grid of the study area

var.name: snowdepth2D
var.description: snow pack water storage at each grid of the study area

var.name: sst2D
var.description: soil surface water storage at each grid of the study area
